name: NewMargin Ventures
overview: NewMargin Ventures is a leading venture capital management company in China. Their overriding mission is to support China’s emerging entrepreneurs to build world-class companies. Their investment strategy is to get involved with entrepreneurs early, share their collective expertise, and work tirelessly to help them execute their business strategies. They focus on industry sectors that they believe will offer phenomenal growth opportunities in the coming decades to which they can add value: broader IT, sustainable growth technology, healthcare and high margin manufacturing. At NewMargin they believe that the majority of companies that will dominate China’s economy in the 21st century have yet to be created. It is their goal to help build these companies.

funding_round.source_description: ET Solar Group Closing of a US$31 Million Series A-1
